pages.text: Follow this route on the Path of Resonance to gain experience both in combat and with your Wit spells. All your spells have a chance to echo and killing mobs drops extra experience. All of your spells cast a level above normal, and their range is slightly increased. Grace spells gain 2x XP.

pages.mods: Echoing, Insightful, Skillful, Lesser Reach, Graceful
